video.title: Heartland
video.synopsis: Spunky teenager Amy is reeling from the sudden death of her mother when she and her grandfather are threatened with the loss of their horse ranch.

episodes.synopsis: When Amy discovers a horse is being abused, she convinces her mother to rescue him and bring him back to Heartland. On the way home, a storm rages.
episodes.title: Coming Home

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Roach's horse, Swallow, is mistakenly sent home before his fear of traffic is fully cured. Ashley is put in danger when Swallow gets spooked.
episodes.title: After the Storm

episodes.synopsis: Lou wants to hold an open house for Heartland. Amy is totally against it, since she's managed to drum up some high-profile clients on her own.
episodes.title: Breaking Free

episodes.synopsis: Ben's horse, Red, runs away. The girls find the horse near a river, but when Amy tries to lead Red across, his fear of water sends him into a panic.
episodes.title: Taking Chances

episodes.synopsis: Lou makes a video to advertise Heartland. But her attitude drives everyone over the edge, and she insists they shoot Amy gentling a wild pony.
episodes.title: The Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: Lou's boyfriend has been offered a job in Chicago, and he's come to Heartland to convince Lou to join him. But all is not right with the proposition.
episodes.title: One Trick Pony

episodes.synopsis: Lou is left alone at Heartland when the pregnant mare, Melody, goes into labor. Lou calls in an eccentric old neighbor to help with the delivery.
episodes.title: Come What May

episodes.synopsis: Terribly burned and injured in a highly publicized stable fire, a famous racehorse is sent to Heartland to see if it can be rehabilitated.
episodes.title: Out of the Darkness

episodes.synopsis: The Flemings' eccentric neighbor, Mrs. Bell, is hospitalized, and Amy brings her traumatized Shetland pony, Sugarfoot, to Heartland.
episodes.title: Ghost from the Past

episodes.synopsis: When Jack takes Ty on a mustang roundup, Ty loses his temper and punches a wrangler for mistreating a horse. Meanwhile, Mallory goes missing.
episodes.title: Born to Run

episodes.synopsis: Lou hopes to impress Tim with her managerial skills, but is heartbroken when she realizes that Amy and Tim share a deeper bond: their love of horses.
episodes.title: Thicker than Water

episodes.synopsis: When one of the barns erupts into flames, Jack is injured getting the horses to safety. Mallory is devastated, and Lou and Amy are drawn together.
episodes.title: Nothing Endures

episodes.synopsis: Amy is training Spartan for a jumping contest. Ben convinces Ashley that Heartland is the only place that can help her suddenly recalcitrant horse.
episodes.title: Coming Together

episodes.synopsis: Four months after Ty's sudden departure, Amy is used to Heartland's new stable hand. She tries to tame a wild mustang, as Lou plans a surprise party.
episodes.title: Ghost Horse

episodes.synopsis: Ty comes back to Heartland and soon realizes much has changed in his absence. Lou and Tim are at odds with Jack over their plans to change Heartland.
episodes.title: Letting Go

episodes.synopsis: When Tim gives Amy a fine Grand Prix jumper for her birthday, she's forced to make a difficult choice between Heartland and a career in show jumping.
episodes.title: Gift Horse

episodes.synopsis: The first day of the much-anticipated spring cattle drive, Lou hustles everyone out of the house, while secretly planning an all-day date with Scott.
episodes.title: Dancing in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Lou reconsiders staying at Heartland when former New York colleagues arrive for an equine retreat. Amy reluctantly helps Lou with her new venture.
episodes.title: Corporate Cowgirls

episodes.synopsis: Riding along the river, Amy encounters an RCMP officer trying to save a boy from drowning. Scott misinterprets Nick's polo match invitation to Lou.
episodes.title: Holding Fast

episodes.synopsis: With the annual Hudson Heritage Rodeo looming, everyone at Heartland goes into the action. Despite various intrigues, even Jack and Tim work together.
episodes.title: Sweetheart of the Rodeo

episodes.synopsis: During a heat wave, a cattle truck loaded with thirsty, overheated horses comes to Heartland. Ty is shocked when the driver turns out to be his dad.
episodes.title: Summer's End

episodes.synopsis: Ty asks Amy for another chance; Ashley makes a decision that surprises Lou. When cattle rustlers hit Big River Ranch, the situation gets out of hand.
episodes.title: Showdown!

episodes.synopsis: When Amy's not-so-favorite teacher, Ms. Adams, brings a horse named Boxer to Heartland, Amy learns a valuable lesson about fathers and daughters.
episodes.title: True Enough

episodes.synopsis: When Hollywood comes to Heartland, Amy is so starstruck she loses track of what's really important in her life.
episodes.title: Starstruck

episodes.synopsis: Lisa meddles into Lou's business and personal life with disastrous results.
episodes.title: Divorce Horse

episodes.synopsis: Lou goes head-to-head with Big Alberta Oil when seismic surveyors force their way onto Heartland.
episodes.title: Seismic Shifts

episodes.synopsis: Clint brings two tough kids on probation to Heartland, forcing Ty to deal with a part of his past he'd rather forget.
episodes.title: Do or Die

episodes.synopsis: Lou resurrects the Hudson Derby, stirring up an age-old grudge match between Jack and Tim.
episodes.title: Dark Horse

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Ty will stop at nothing to get Spartan back after he's stolen.
episodes.title: The Ties that Bind

episodes.synopsis: Amy heads to the mountains to visit a horse healer named Victor Whitetail -- and leaves with a new understanding about horses, her mom and herself.
episodes.title: Full Circle

episodes.synopsis: Ty and Amy are finally forced to deal with their feelings for each other after a snowstorm strands them at Jack's fishing cabin in the mountains.
episodes.title: Step by Step

episodes.synopsis: Amy is thrust into the limelight when she performs a "miracle" on a traumatized horse and a video clip of the event is posted online.
episodes.title: Miracle

episodes.synopsis: Amy finds herself in the middle of a family crisis when she tries to help a girl and her horse recover from what appears to be a freak accident.
episodes.title: Little Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Jack's truck is on its way to rust bucket heaven, forcing him to find the courage to say goodbye to a part of his past.
episodes.title: Man's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Ty spend the night in the "haunted" Hanley barn, trying to get to the bottom of a mystery.
episodes.title: The Haunting of Hanley Barn

episodes.synopsis: As Tim and Jack relive their glory days, Amy wonders if Ty is revisiting his past when he and Kit are thrown together to deal with her pregnant mare.
episodes.title: Glory Days

episodes.synopsis: When Amy and Ty become the proud new parents of an orphaned foal, the strength of their relationship is put to the test.
episodes.title: Growing Pains

episodes.synopsis: When Tim buys a racehorse from Lisa, he puts everything on the line -- including Amy -- to win big.
episodes.title: The Starting Gate

episodes.synopsis: Ty protects his mother, Lily, from his abusive stepfather, who shows up at Heartland to win her back.
episodes.title: The Fix

episodes.synopsis: Amy is upset when Ty flies off with Scott to a remote vet call on his last day before heading to vet school.
episodes.title: Broken Arrow

episodes.synopsis: Amy leads a rescue search to find Ty and Scott, whose plane has gone missing in a remote forested mountain area.
episodes.title: Eye of the Wolf

episodes.synopsis: While the boys are on a fishing trip, the girls are left at Heartland to deal with the havoc caused by a dog, a porcupine and a herd of escaped cows.
episodes.title: Catch and Release

episodes.synopsis: Victor Whitetail makes a visit to Heartland, which stirs up the past and leaves Tim wondering if Victor was more than just friends with his ex-wife.
episodes.title: The Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: When a dangerous horse virus called Strangles puts Heartland under quarantine, relationships are put to the test, and Pegasus becomes very ill.
episodes.title: Quarantine

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Ty are at odds over his purchase of a motorcycle, while Caleb goes to a rodeo in Montana despite Ashley's concerns about life on the circuit.
episodes.title: The Happy List

episodes.synopsis: Amy faces a tough moral dilemma when she discovers Mr. Hanley has abandoned his horses and is on the brink of losing his farm.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: Caleb tries to get over the physical and emotional scars from his accident as Amy tries to get him back on a horse, and Tim doles out some tough love.
episodes.title: Spin Out!

episodes.synopsis: When Amy follows in her mother's footsteps and enters a pro colt-starting competition, her gift with horses and self-confidence are put to the test.
episodes.title: Ring of Fire

episodes.synopsis: A surprise announcement by Peter throws Lou's wedding plans into disarray, while Amy and Ty are forced to make tough decisions about their futures.
episodes.title: In the Cards

episodes.synopsis: Amy tries to pretend that nothing has changed when Ty returns to Heartland with a surprise guest.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Amy scratches the surface to discover Nick Harwell's problems with his polo ponies. Tim's relationship with his jockey is not what it appears to be.
episodes.title: What Dreams May Become

episodes.synopsis: When an unspoken attraction resurfaces, Amy discovers that honesty might be the best policy, but it certainly isn't the easiest one.
episodes.title: Road Curves

episodes.synopsis: A looming high school graduation and Spartan's near-fatal bout with colic force Amy to face where her future really lies.
episodes.title: Graduation

episodes.synopsis: When Amy and Ty persuade Sarah, the town recluse, to let them treat her sick horse at Heartland, the family helps her face the ghosts of her past.
episodes.title: Where the Truth Lies

episodes.synopsis: Tim enlists Amy to ride Lightning Dexter in a big-time stakes race when he finds out his girlfriend, Janice, has teamed up with the competition.
episodes.title: Win, Place or Show

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Kit have to put their differences behind them when they take on Caleb in a team-roping jackpot.
episodes.title: Jackpot!

episodes.synopsis: When Amy is hired to do a horse clinic with a group of inmates, Ty is surprised to discover one of them is a friend from his days at the group home.
episodes.title: One Day

episodes.synopsis: When Ty and Amy find her father's stolen cattle, Tim convinces the family they need to take the law into their own hands.
episodes.title: Local Hero

episodes.synopsis: It's a week before Christmas when an anonymous call is received at Heartland about starving, abandoned horses trapped in an avalanche. Amy, Ty, Jack and Tim head out on a rescue mission.
episodes.title: A Heartland Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Ty and Amy's relationship is put in jeopardy when Ty's travel buddies, Grant and Blair, return to Heartland.
episodes.title: Mood Swings

episodes.synopsis: Amy fights to keep Dexter in the family when she learns Tim is putting the horse up for sale in a claiming race.
episodes.title: Family Business

episodes.synopsis: Jack is forced to revisit a rough patch in his marriage when he finds an unfinished song by Lyndy in her old guitar case.
episodes.title: Lost Song

episodes.synopsis: Ty has some tough decisions to make when Jack leaves him literally at a crossroads.
episodes.title: The Road Home

episodes.synopsis: Amy must deal with Stewart Forrest's unrealistic expectations when she works with his daughter and a jumper that may be too much horse for the girl.
episodes.title: Leap of Faith

episodes.synopsis: Lou helps Amy fight Stewart Forrest's bitter lawsuit to save her sister's reputation and the family business.
episodes.title: The River

episodes.synopsis: When Bryce, a paralyzed military vet and ex-rodeo cowboy, hires Amy to help sell his roping horse, she sees a chance to retrain both horse and rider.
episodes.title: Never Surrender

episodes.synopsis: A horse-crazy boy comes to Heartland and quickly bonds with Amy. But his mother has a secret that could change everything for the Fleming family.
episodes.title: Burning Down the House

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Ty work on their trust issues as they train a pair of Clydesdales, but it's an emergency at Heartland that reveals their strength as a team.
episodes.title: Passages

episodes.synopsis: Amy is inspired to take her horsemanship to a new level when she works with a professional liberty horse trainer.
episodes.title: Finding Freedom

episodes.synopsis: When Tim is coerced to go with Jack on a secret mission, Amy is left back at Heartland with Janice to get a young racehorse ready for his maiden run.
episodes.title: Something in the Night

episodes.synopsis: When Tim reveals to the family that Shane is his son, it threatens to ruin the traditional Bartlett-Fleming naming ceremony for Lou's baby.
episodes.title: What's in a Name

episodes.synopsis: When Amy works with a chuck wagon horse, she discovers an impediment that could put the team in danger and affect a prominent chuck wagon family.
episodes.title: Beyond Hell's Half Mile

episodes.synopsis: Amy helps to restore the confidence of a troubled young trick-rider so that she can get back on her horse and perform again.
episodes.title: Never Let Go

episodes.synopsis: A friend from Jack's past comes to Heartland when an old band mate passes away. Lou and Lisa plan a reunion performance to celebrate Jack's birthday.
episodes.title: The Slippery Slope

episodes.synopsis: When Shane arrives to stay for the summer, Tim tries to impress all three of his kids with a "really cool" Western day trip.
episodes.title: Over the Rise

episodes.synopsis: When Ty visits Mrs. Bell to thank her for paying his school fees, he's surprised to learn she's moved out of her home and away from Sugarfoot.
episodes.title: Nothing for Granted

episodes.synopsis: When Tim's racehorse Cisco is stolen on the way to his maiden race, Amy and Ty get help tracking him down from an unlikely source: Ty's stepfather.
episodes.title: Cover Me

episodes.synopsis: When Amy bravely tries to heal an abused and extremely violent racehorse, Ty and Jack think she's finally bitten off more than she can chew.
episodes.title: Trust

episodes.synopsis: Ty's mother, Lily, returns to Heartland with shocking news about his father and a secret that threatens her relationship with her son.
episodes.title: Fool's Gold

episodes.synopsis: When Jack learns Ty is riding his bike solo to a remote lake to spread his father's ashes, he decides to surprise Ty and join him for the trip.
episodes.title: Road to Nowhere

episodes.synopsis: Trying to avoid hitting a wolf, Ty is badly hurt when he crashes his bike on a remote road, leaving Jack to search for help in the middle of nowhere.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: Amy is roped into helping Tim project a positive image to the community, in hopes it will further his custody case for Shane.
episodes.title: Working on a Dream

episodes.synopsis: When tragedy strikes, Amy must find a way to save Mr. Hanley's rescue horses from kill buyers.
episodes.title: Breaking Down and Building Up

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Ty join Scott on a trip back to his old reservation to save a herd of wild horses from the dangerous EHV-1 virus.
episodes.title: Wild Horses

episodes.synopsis: When Amy's dog Lobo is injured by a trigger-happy rancher, it's up to Ty to save the dog's life.
episodes.title: True Calling

episodes.synopsis: When a mystery horse arrives at Heartland, Amy and Ty are sent down a path that will alter their lives.
episodes.title: Candles in the Wind

episodes.synopsis: Amy is bursting to ask Ty about the engagement ring, and why he hasn't proposed yet, but a couple of "runaways" throw everything at Heartland into turmoil.
episodes.title: Running Against the Wind

episodes.synopsis: Ty struggles to deal with the fact that Amy has found the engagement ring and has to decide how and whether he is going to propose to her or not.
episodes.title: Crossed Signals

episodes.synopsis: Tim hopes for a big commission when he helps a wealthy weekend cowboy look for his dream ranch, while Amy's stuck teaching his trophy wife how to ride.
episodes.title: Keeping Up Appearances

episodes.synopsis: Amy tries to fulfill Mallory's dream of being a show jumper but discovers that it's Georgie who has the natural talent.
episodes.title: The Natural

episodes.synopsis: Janice brings Cisco Kid (and her emotional baggage over Tim) to Heartland for Amy to figure out why Cisco's lost that winning feeling.
episodes.title: Trial Run

episodes.synopsis: Amy seeks out an up-and-coming show jumper (Jeremy) to learn why he's refusing Scott and Ty's suggested treatment for his horse.
episodes.title: Helping Hands

episodes.synopsis: Chase Powers returns to Heartland with an aspiring "liberty horse" rider (Hayley) who wants Amy to be her coach. And Amy is shocked to learn what Hayley's connection is to Chase.
episodes.title: Life is a Highway

episodes.synopsis: When Ty needs some engine parts for his broken down truck he's forced to turn to the last person on earth he wants help from - his stepfather, Wade.
episodes.title: Do the Right Thing

episodes.synopsis: A trip to help out an old friend at a fishing camp doesn't go as planned, and a series of unexpected events elevate it into a life-changing weekend for the entire family.
episodes.title: Great Expectations

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Ty hold off telling the family their great news when they return from their trip to find everyone reeling from the devastating fire at Lou and Peter's home.
episodes.title: The Road Ahead

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy forces Amy to make a tough decision about Phoenix when his horse, Buckingham, sustains a serious injury that threatens his jumping career.
episodes.title: Blowing Smoke

episodes.synopsis: When a local horse show is cancelled Lou saves the day for Georgie and Mallory by stepping up to host it at Heartland.
episodes.title: Playing with Fire

episodes.synopsis: Scott discovers that Spartan has a broken leg and Amy is forced to make the toughest decision of her life.
episodes.title: Waiting for Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: Ty's future as a vet is in serious jeopardy when he's blamed for a shocking fatality at Scott's clinic.
episodes.title: Lost and Gone Forever

episodes.synopsis: To clear his own name, Ty searches for damning evidence to prove Jeremy was behind Buckingham's death.
episodes.title: After All We've Been Through

episodes.synopsis: Amy is having trouble dealing with a roping horse that only wants to buck and Caleb, who isn't sure he wants to ride broncs anymore.
episodes.title: Born to Buck

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Lou help Georgie regain her confidence as a showjumper when Olivia makes her question her place in the family.
episodes.title: Breaking Point

episodes.synopsis: With the threat of losing Phoenix looming over their heads, things become even more complicated at Heartland when Georgie gets a surprise visit from her brother Jeff.
episodes.title: Under Pressure
